Name: Dark Podval
About the game: Dark Podval - platformer where you have to go through the basement mazes, solve puzzles and avoid deadly traps. Can you get out of there alive and take all the coins? Background: You descend the steps into the mysterious darkness ... What is it hiding? Is this really an ordinary basement or is there something more behind it? What awaits you in the game: - Variety of game mechanics (from death traps to items that help in passing) - An in-game store where you can buy items that transform the gameplay - A plot that gradually reveals the true essence of this mysterious place ...
